channel.title: Iron Power Miner Requested === $50 dollars down
channel.description:
[IMG]http://www.slopdog.com/forum/hosted/runescape.jpg[/img]
I want the miner to do exactly that as said above.
So that would mean two scripts. One would be for Iron and one for Coal.
Also, another script which would be a perfect powerminer, which would powermine Iron for me and drop FAST, at the same place would be fine. Along with Randoms and SRL.
The offer is for $50 dollars...through Verified Paypal.
My MSN is hemmatmohammad@msn.com if you have any questions.
I would also like these to NOT be released to the public..if you want, you can release it to the scar sales :P, but not at a cheap price :) as this is going to be one hell of a script.
After completion, I will send you money, and you will send me the 3 scripts along with your zipped scar folder to replace mine :P
Cmon scripters, take advantage of the rich guy :)
